function_description: Toggle the visibility of the new password entry.
initial_state: User is logged into the web application and navigates to the 'Authentication' settings page. The 'Edit Password' modal dialog is open.
steps: Locate the 'toggle visibility' button next to the 'New password' input field.
Click the 'toggle visibility' button to change the visibility of the new password entry.
expected_state: The new password entry becomes visible or hidden based on the user's choice, allowing easier verification of the input.
